lead_paragraph: When the Minnesota Twins hired Derek Falvey away from Cleveland to take over their baseball operations the day after the regular season concluded, they did so with the caveat that he would join the organization as soon as the Indians' season came to an end.

headline.print_headline: New Twins Front Office Hits the Ground Running
headline.main: New Twins Front Office Hits the Ground Running
